info.name: 3commas from swagger
info.description:
# Introduction
What does your API do?

# Overview
Things that the developers should know about

# Authentication
What is the preferred way of using the API?

# Error Codes
What errors and status codes can a user expect?

# Rate limit
Is there a limit to the number of requests an user can send?

item.name: post Ver1Bots Bot Id Start New Deal

urlencoded.description: Can be omited for simple bot
If false or not specified then all paramaters like signals or volume filters will be checked. If true - those checks will be skipped
If true then you will be allowed to open more then one deal per pair in composite bot

exec: // variable injection is done after pre-request scripts. We need to do it with the folowing line
// important for signature calculation. Do NOT omit this part
if (!key) throw new Error(`Must set collection var: THREE_COMMAS_API_KEY, current value: ${key}`);
if (!secret) throw new Error(`Must set collection var: THREE_COMMAS_API_SECRET, current value: ${secret}`);
